list-item.p: High activity TLL is made by dually bioimprinting with substrate alcohol and a surfactant.
TLL (28 U/g of oil) bioimprinted with only the surfactants could yield 99% biodiesel from soybean oil in about 4 h.
Dually bioimprinted TLL (only 1.4 U/g of oil) was able to yield 99% biodiesel within 48 h
